# slide 4

Then $w$ satisfies the diffusion equation
$$ \begin{cases}
\partial\_t w - \kappa \partial_x^2  w = 0, ~ x \in [0,L], t>0  \\\\
u(0, x) = 0 \\\\
w(0,t) = 0, ~ w(L,t) = 0.
\end{cases} $$
